reviews.review: Obviamente o CS:GO √© o melhor game online da steam, de longe.
very good game but valve need to ban the hackers

This game WAS amazing. The shooting and aiming mechanics are unlike any game out there. This game requires brain power and strategy. However.... recently they made this game free to play, allowing hackers and cheaters to flow freely.
Jogo bom, nao gostei muito depois da atualizacao do menu Mas O jogo continua Mt Foda
i dont come across cheaters that often anymore thank you valve
Full of cheaters. Worst CS:GO update was when the game became free to play. "prime" does't defend you against of cheaters, it's just a matter of time when you'll start playing against or with them.
Good game but full of hackers. You will get 9/10 matches with cheaters.

Its a good game, I got it way before it actually went free. Sadly I got VAC Banned after I was hacked for 2 days and never got the VAC removed, the game is nice tho. I guess the only thing that sucks is playing against hackers on here so I respect my ban considering how annoying it is.
